# TimeFrame { #flood_adapt.objects.TimeFrame }

```python
objects.TimeFrame()
```

Class representing a time frame for a simulation.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

<code>[**start_time**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[datetime](`datetime.datetime`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The start time of the simulation.

<code>[**end_time**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[datetime](`datetime.datetime`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The end time of the simulation.

<code>[**time_step**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[timedelta](`datetime.timedelta`)]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   The time step of the simulation. Default is calculated as 1/1000 of the duration.
